26#include "hb.hh"
27#include "hb-number.hh"
28#include "hb-number-parser.hh"
29
30template<typename T, typename Func>
31static bool
32_parse_number (const char **pp, const char *end, T *pv,
33 bool whole_buffer, Func f)
34{
35 char buf[32];
36 unsigned len = hb_min (ARRAY_LENGTH (buf) - 1, (unsigned) (end - *pp));
37 strncpy (dest: buf, src: *pp, n: len);
38 buf[len] = '\0';
39
40 char *p = buf;
41 char *pend = p;
42
43 errno = 0;
44 *pv = f (p, &pend);
45 if (unlikely (errno || p == pend ||
46 /* Check if consumed whole buffer if is requested */
47 (whole_buffer && pend - p != end - *pp)))
48 return false;
49
50 *pp += pend - p;
51 return true;
52}
53
54bool
55hb_parse_int (const char **pp, const char *end, int *pv, bool whole_buffer)
56{
57 return _parse_number<int> (pp, end, pv, whole_buffer,
58 f: [] (const char *p, char **end)
59 { return strtol (nptr: p, endptr: end, base: 10); });
60}
61
62bool
63hb_parse_uint (const char **pp, const char *end, unsigned *pv,
64 bool whole_buffer, int base)
65{
66 return _parse_number<unsigned> (pp, end, pv, whole_buffer,
67 f: [base] (const char *p, char **end)
68 { return strtoul (nptr: p, endptr: end, base: base); });
69}
70
71bool
72hb_parse_double (const char **pp, const char *end, double *pv, bool whole_buffer)
73{
74 const char *pend = end;
75 *pv = strtod_rl (p: *pp, end_ptr: &pend);
76 if (unlikely (*pp == pend)) return false;
77 *pp = pend;
78 return !whole_buffer || end == pend;
79}
